# URLRequest.Attribution

**Type Alias**

A type that indicates the entities that can make a network request.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Attribution = NSURLRequest.Attribution
```

## Discussion

Use one of the values in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLRequest/Attribution-swift.enum].

## Indicating the source of the request

- **attribution**: The entity that initiates the network request.
